SEARCH
Package GameEngine

Class TextOverlay

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.GameObject
GameEngine.TextOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOverlay
public class TextOverlay extends GameObject implements IOverlay
Utility class for creating text overlays. Should be inherited. (or contained)
See Also:
  • TextOverlayOutline

  • Constructor Details

    • TextOverlay

      public TextOverlay(Rectangle camera)
      Initializes a TextOverlay overlay
      Parameters:
      camera - the camera to generate the overlay in

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the overlay, making it a blank canvas

    • setOutline

      public void setOutline(TextOverlayOutline outline)
      Sets an outline for the overlay
      Parameters:
      outline - the outline for the overlay

    • setOutline

      public void setOutline(char cornerTL, char cornerTR, char cornerDL, char cornerDR, char sideLR, char sideTD)
      Sets an outline for the overlay
      Parameters:
      cornerTL - the top left corner character
      cornerTR - the top right corner character
      cornerDL - the bottom left corner character
      cornerDR - the bottom right corner character
      sideLR - the left and right sides character
      sideTD - the top and bottom character

    • fillEmpty

      public void fillEmpty()
      Fills the entire inside of the overlay with a whitespace

    • fill

      public void fill(char c)
      Fills the entire inside of the overlay
      Parameters:
      c - the character to fill the inside of the overlay with

    • writeCentered

      public void writeCentered(String str, int index)
      Writes a text centered on the overlay on the provided index the 0 index is the top of the overlay if the index is invalid or if the text is too big, nothing will be written
      Parameters:
      str - the text to write
      index - the index to write on (starts on top)

    • writeLeft

      public void writeLeft(String str, int index)
      Writes a text aligned to the left of the overlay the 0 index is the top of the overlay if the index is invalid or if the text is too big, nothing will be written
      Parameters:
      str - the text to write
      index - the index to write on (starts on top)

    • writeRight

      public void writeRight(String str, int index)
      Writes a text aligned to the right of the overlay the 0 index is the top of the overlay if the index is invalid or if the text is too big, nothing will be written
      Parameters:
      str - the text to write
      index - the index to write on (starts on top)

    • writeParagraph

      public void writeParagraph(String str, int index)
      Writes a paragraph aligned to the left of the overlay, possibly spanning multiple lines the 0 index is the top of the overlay if the index is invalid nothing will be written
      Parameters:
      str - the text to write
      index - the index to start writing on
